entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: W 35 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
